availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hart County, Kentucky clerk. Kentucky native.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, p. 202. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registrations, 1863-1865, Ancestry, Kentucky, Third Congressional District, Hart County, 1864, p. 66. “Joel Taylor Compton (1842-1867),” Find A Grave, memorial no. 83102684, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=COM&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSsr=5081&GRid=83102684& (accessed June 5, 2017).
